Armor Through the Ages was a reference book detailing armor metallurgy practices throughout Torils history, up until the early 14 century DR.Beyond it being a metallurgical reference book, the contents of this book were not detailed in this adventure. Thus the listed summary was partially inferred from the title of the book itself.
One copy of this tome laid within Bard Keep, a temple of Oghma that stood within the North near Silverymoon.
